document.full_text: north korea on sunday rejected allegations by the rival south that it was behind a cyber attack that paralyzed the computer network of a south korean bank last month and accused seoul of inventing a conspiracy to justify physical confrontation.
document.title: north korea rejects south charge it was behind bank cyber attack
lines_and_colors: north korea on sunday rejected allegations by the rival south that it was behind a cyber attack that paralyzed the computer network of a south korean bank last month and accused seoul of inventing a conspiracy to justify physical confrontation.
